channel.title: Anti-dupe help

item.title: Anti-dupe help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You can easily make a static integer something like this:

public static int dupechecker[] = {ITEMID, ITEMID, ITEMID};

and then make it check via the method you are using.

Read full topic

item.title: Anti-dupe help
item.dc:creator: @Ibehustlin247 Ibehustlin247
item.description:
@Ibehustlin247 wrote:

Alright. below is a form of anti-dupe I added to my server, keep in mind this code is based off of the Richscape source so it may look different but it works. What I need to know is how do I add to this process to make it search for more than one item? I have it set to noted red partyhats right now, but I want it to look for more than just red partyhats, I want it to search for all noted partyhats.

public void process() { if (hasAmount(1039, 2) == true) { removeAllItems(); Send("Your duplicated items have just been jacked by Matt....GF."); }

This is the process I have right now, how would I correctly add onto it so that it would search for more than just that partyhat? Help is greatly appreciated.

Read full topic
